column1: b'THE NEW YORK TIMES YOU NEVER FORGET YOUR FIRST'
column7: b'(I\'m Ben Brantley.) The first show I reviewed for The New York Times was an ill-fated 1993 sequel to this beloved musical; there wasn\'t much to like--even the dog who played Sandy was rather wooden'
